website_summaries.verdict: The Li-Ning Saga keeps the player comfortable even during long periods of play. It is a reasonably-priced trainer that offers lightweight support, flexibility, and solid traction.
pros: A lot of athletes report no pain or discomfort when they use the Li-Ning Saga for practice or competition
Many users appreciate how light it is compared to other badminton trainers
According to numerous buyers, this model is worth the price because it is crafted from quality materials
Multiple reviewers commend the grip of the outsole
The ankle support in this trainer satisfies the needs of several players when it comes to lateral hold
cons: There are more than a few complaints that the upper is too sparkly/glittery compared to the pictures online
A few testers dislike that the upper gets loose after a month of use

customer_reviews.title: Best I have used so far.
customer_reviews.text: I am still breaking in with this shoes. My initial impressions are as follows: Pros: - Lightweight - Fits really well and provides the right support and comfort. - No aches and pains on my feet or ankles after a few games. - Good packaging Cons. - This is subjective. Shoes look glittery (it doesn't appear in the pics).
customer_reviews.author: InsaneNirvana

customer_reviews.title: Racquetball
customer_reviews.text: Got these shoes for racquetball. I'll admit the design and color is a bit out there but they look sharp out on the court. very cool looking. I like rocking these on the court. They are comfortable for use on the court. They grip well and provide plenty of traction. Not sure how they'd hold up for walking or regular running. Sizing was spot on. I am a 10.5 in Nike, Addidas, Newton, Altras... and these in 10.5 fit fine.
customer_reviews.author: PH

customer_reviews.title: A bargain for the quality
customer_reviews.text: I had reservations given the price differential between this shoe and the top brans shoes ... but, happily, I am sold on this shoe. I play competitive Pickleball 4 days/ week and light a shoe that is snug but wont rub uncomfortably. I have a moderately narrow foot; so it's possible (as the manufacturer suggests) to elect a half size larger. I have no regrets.
customer_reviews.author: JLuhn

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, good looking
customer_reviews.text: Good grip, very good ankle support. I was specifically looking for something with good ankle support and this one’s much better than the Yonex I used before this.
customer_reviews.author: SOHANGC

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes, they have been great for playing pickle ballPickelball
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes, they have been great for playing pickle ball
customer_reviews.author: gepparker

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Perfect fit. Played several badminton games with it and it feels great. Aesthetics could be a little better.
customer_reviews.author: Cleveland_Matt

customer_reviews.title: Runs little wide
customer_reviews.text: The toe width runs larger than mentioned. Grip is more than avg. Overall an average shoe.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The shoes is comfortable and lightweight. The outside looks nice, and the bottom it’s not slippery. Of all the design looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Ye

customer_reviews.title: So much grip I bought 2 pair
customer_reviews.text: I bought these hoping they would work for playing squash. After playing 5 times I found that they had way more grip then I had hoped for. The price was so reasonable that I decided to buy 2 pairs hoping to get longer life out of two pairs instead of just one pair.
customer_reviews.author: matthew hesley

customer_reviews.title: worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as my Mizuno wave II, but these shoes do the job. Fabric vents make them breathable and minimize the odors. Ankle support should have been more enforced
customer_reviews.author: Ballu

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe, great value.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable with good support and good traction. The sizes may run slightly small. I usually wear a 10.5 or 11 and the 11 fit perfectly. Note that the silver color has a little sparkle in the underlying mesh. Not full-on bling, but it is noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for wide feet!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this shoes. However, after some research, this brand is really popular in south east Asia market. The brand lived up to its fame! It gives a lot of traction even on wet and humid court.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Best indoor sportswear - Wish i bought them sooner
customer_reviews.text: I simply love these shoes. They are so comfy and feel so light that u feel as if u are flying. They grip very well and feel is soft and perfect for any indoor sportZ. Also they are quiet without any squeaky noises. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Kon

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful functional shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite shoes. Perfect for badminton court and I also use it for boxing training. Don't use it outside though. You don't want dirt and debris sticking to the sole. I absolutely love the complete support it provides to the feet
customer_reviews.author: Sambitesh

customer_reviews.title: Gets Comfortable with use. Solid built and great style.
customer_reviews.text: Got the one in orange color for me about a year ago and got another one in silver for my teenaged son a couple of months ago. He also loves it. Sturdy, comfortable and fits great.
customer_reviews.author: Sanjeev

customer_reviews.title: Shinier than the pictures
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoes, but it has a strong sheen on the surface making is very shinny and sparkly. I decided it wasn't for me so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda W.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes but you need to pick one size larger!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I decided to buy the shoes again in size 10 (although mine is really 9). So far very comfortable and excellent quality! I had to return the shoes, as they are at least one size smaller than the true size!
customer_reviews.author: VTHokie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing badminton shoes for the price point.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. Wish they have a little bit more cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Ramya

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I play badminton couple of days a week. I bought these pair of shoes recently, they are very comfortable. These are cheaper compared to other badminton shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best court shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Fits like a glove, best court shoe I've worn in 30 years, fantastic price.
customer_reviews.author: Marco

customer_reviews.title: Could not hold feet tight.
customer_reviews.text: This shoe’s rear end side is very loose. Could not support my ankle well. It felt loose and unsafe. I don’t like this purchase
customer_reviews.author: H. X

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: So far working great. I have used it for 3-4 badminton sessions. It feels light weight, comfortable and i did not experience any stress or pain in my ankles. moving on the court was excellent with this shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Prashant N. Barve

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: This shoes are really good for badminton. I think its little bit tight. But Hoping to get fit in some days.
customer_reviews.author: Akhil Kumar Reddy Chityala

customer_reviews.title: great shows
customer_reviews.text: great pair of shoes so far, good control - im use in the badminton court
customer_reviews.author: Yonex Fan

customer_reviews.title: top shoe.
customer_reviews.text: For me one of the best brands I have ever used. Really like Li Ning shoes.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Product was perfect and in good condition.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit as expected and were in an excellent condition
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sole wore off
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of this shoe but for some reason the sole of this shoe wore off in about a week.
customer_reviews.author: Vikas bhatia

customer_reviews.title: Very good grip on ground
customer_reviews.text: Good grip on ground, very good support to ankle, but it is a little bit large
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Wu

customer_reviews.title: Well design badminton shoes
customer_reviews.text: The pair is very good in quality. The support is great.
customer_reviews.author: Win

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and comfort. Fits very well
customer_reviews.text: Fits very well and very comfortable while playing. Overall a very good product
customer_reviews.author: Venkatesh Chary C

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Quality is very good and 100% worth for your money
customer_reviews.author: Siva

customer_reviews.title: Fit Well and Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: I am quite enjoying these shoes! They are lighter than my last pair and the grip is quite satisfying! I have had a number of comments on them too:) I have had them for about a month now, so I cant say much on how they last.
customer_reviews.author: Tiff

product_meta.title: LI-NING Men Saga Lightweight Badminton Shoes Breathable Professional Sport Shoes AYTM085
product_meta.description:
Lining Men Saga Professional Lightweight Training Badminton Shoes
Model Number: AYTM085
Shoe Upper: Air Mesh+Synthetic Leather
Shoe Sole: Rubber
Air-Rollover Design: Air-rollover designed for increasing the stability of shoes.
Xtructure: A cross strap construction at the heel enhances the badminton shoes stability and reduces the possibility injury to the ankle.
Anti-collision Toe: Rubber in the toe can protect toes from collision and protect you from sport injury.
High Technology: Using Lining footwear technology, make shoes shock absorption, rebound, lightweight, stanility, environmental control, abrasion resistance.

LI-NING Brand Story
Li Ning Company Limited is a leading sports brand companies in China, mainly providing sporting goods including footwear, apparel, equipment and accessories for professional and leisure purposes primarily under the LI-NING brand. Headquartered in Beijing, the Group has brand marketing, research and development, design, manufacturing, distribution and retail capabilities. It has established an extensive supply chain management system and a retail distribution network in China.
In respect of basketball products, we continued to explore room for development of casual wear category business while maintaining our professionalism. In terms of promotion, on one hand, the Group expanded products and increased product exposure through various means such as sponsorship of tournaments. On the other hand, we launched featured game apparel, fan-culture related apparel and others according to tournament schedules, which received positive consumer feedback.
Core Value of LINING BRAND is Live for dream, consumer oriented, we culture, breakthrough
feature_bullets: MATERIAL: Air mesh upper with synthetic leather overlays for increasing breathable, non-marking gum rubber sole designed for abrasion resistant and anti skid.

TUFF TIP: An extra layer of reinforcement is applied along the inside front and toe area of the badminton shoe. This helps to help extend the life of the shoes and provide superior product performance.
MULTIFLEX SOLE: This advanced badminton shoe design provides a flexible sole by installing multiple pivot points making the shoe perform and feel incredibly fast and comfortable.
XSTRUCTURE: It is a tighten device for the heel. It can adjust the tightness based on the needs and improve good protection for the strong demand on anti-rollover, such as this badminton shoes.
International products have separate terms, are sold from abroad and may differ from local products, including fit, age ratings, and language of product, labeling or instructions.
